summary.span: Der -Namespace enthält die Methoden, die im LDAP-Standard (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol), Version 3, und im DSML-Standard (Directory Services Markup Language), Version 2.0, definiert sind.

span.span: The namespace provides the methods defined in the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) version 3 (V3) and Directory Services Markup Language (DSML) version 2.0 (V2) standards.
